title: Filipino green bean and bottle gourd stew
ingredients: ['450ml light coconut milk', '2 tablespoons prawn paste', '1 onion, chopped', '1 (5cm) piece fresh root ginger, peeled and sliced', '225g pork, cut into bite-sized pieces', '225g peeled and deveined prawns', '450g fresh fine green beans, trimmed and cut into 5cm pieces', '1 (450g) bottle gourd, peeled and cut into cubes', '1 green chilli, halved lengthways', '250ml coconut cream']
